Pre-Game Insights: England will be eager to turn things around after their dismal World Cup showings in the last two years
Australia will be touring England for three T20Is and five ODIs starting September 11
With new coach Brendon McCullum at helm, England will look to start fresh against their arch rivals
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be the first full-strength tour for both teams barring forced exclusions
The biggest forced exclusion remains of England white ball skipper Jos Buttler who is out due to an injury
Others: Phil Salt will have the responsibility to lead England in T20Is as the team awaits on Buttler's injury update for the ODI series
Mitchell Marsh will lead Australia who have just completed a 3-0 drubbing of Scotland in the run-up to the England series
